author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is the 81x version of the 80x PR #15980.

Except that here in 81x, the l1t-tsg-9.2 has been fully merged, so what remains is only the fix in EMTF emulator to rid of duplicate tracks. Additional change from auto_ptr to unique_ptr is to sync with these changes made in 81x.
- STATUS: Pending blessing from L1T DPG.
title: Pr81x fix duplicate tracks EMTF on top l1t-tsg-v9.2-post-O2O-pr
